description: Water Development Commission is looking to hire qualified applicants who fulfill the following requirements
education: First Degree in Purchasing and Management, Management, Accounting
howToApply: Qualified applicants who fulfill the above requirements should submit all their necessary credentials such as Educational Background, Work Experince(include details such as employment details, start and end date as well as previous salary), CV along with an unreturnable photocopy to the following address: Haile Gebresilase Street, next to Capital Hotel, inside the Ministry of Water, Irrigation and Energy campus, 1st-floor Human Resource Management Office number 23 Addis Ababa.
